I've been waiting 4 years for a proper Urgot update. Either make him a top lane fighter or make him a marksman. Don't just do nothing and leave him as a hybrid that hasn't fit in the meta for 3 Seasons of ranked gameplay.

Team Builder Should be Pick your lane then once you've found 5 players pick your champions... You know how hard it is when you cant change and you find out you need a tank or maybe more CC... pls Consider {{summoner:4}} away

you don't need 5 pots any more, just take both buffs then back and get your 350 gold upgrade and more pots.

That's not opening the jungle to any new meta though. I prefer to clear 3 buffs for the level before backing, but with most of my junglers now I can barely clear 2 buffs. Sona has a better clear than Shyvana even POST patch here.

I LOOOVE the {{champion:113}} buffs, mainly her mana pool; she can now start Gromp and not be oom when she get's Blue!

But why, for the love of god, did you buff {{champion:16}} heal and {{champion:157}}? Yasuo is the resource-less, spam-a-lot king of the rift enough as is, why give him more spamability?

And if you want to nerf {{champion:236}}, hit his Q ratio's. %110 AD at rank 5 (plus the AP and standard damage increase) just take's the term "lane-bully" and injects it with a needle from a stranger at a gym.
{{champion:236}} passive was his strogest feature now hes unplayable

as a lucian player myself i have to agree that his passive is too strong early game allowin him to win all trades easily and get early kills that makes him too snowbally. the change that riot made is well targeted keeping his earlygame in line while not hurting his lategame high burst. if you think he isnt playable now then you are playing him wrong
Excellent Patch Riot :) Very glad to see many balance changes and not just rampaging nerfs following so many new changes in the pre-season. Thank you for the great work. Many of us appreciate it <3

you're meant to take like three camps and back with 350 gold to get the upgrade... you don't need 5 pots any more

> FOCUS FEAR Dealing magic damage or casting Terrify applies Dread to enemies for 2.5 seconds, reducing their magic resistance by 10

> GO BACK TO YOUR MACHETE All jungle camps now give 10 less gold

Force jungler must have jungler item yet saying
> The big theme of the 2015 preseason (and boy will you hear this a lot) is Strategic Diversity.
> With these new paths in place, how you strive for victory will vary with each individual game and our hope is that all of this adds up to more far more strategic diversity and experimentation in League. 
> In 2015, our focus for bringing Strategic Diversity (still a better phrase than end-game fantasy) to the jungle comes down to ironing out a set of strengths and weaknesses for each champion.
> This preseason, rather than trying to kick the best champions back in line, we instead focused on taking bigger steps to bring strategic diversity back to the jungle.
> Our objective with items is the same as our overarching 2015 preseason goal: strategic diversity.

strategic diversity? strategic demotesity!

Triple warwick nerfs (Abilities, Skirmishers & Devourer) back to back with last patch's nerf, that's not overkill...
no it's not, that's correct. WW was broken

Yes, the Skirmishers + Devourers was OP on him, hence his sudden extreme rise in popularity the moment they were added to the game.  They have since been neutered for him, why nerf his abilities too?  He was not a popular pick beforehand yet is now weaker than ever.
